channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews

item.description: An alligator stopped pedestrians in their tracks as it took its time crossing a walkway in Murrells Inlet, South Carolina.

item.title: Texas officials are trying to figure out who’s really missing from the floods
Russia kills 2 in Kyiv in 'obvious escalation of terror,' Zelenskyy says
item.description: At least two people were killed in Kyiv and 22 injured across Ukraine in an overnight Russian drone and missile bombardment, Ukrainian officials said.

item.title: Whistleblower's texts suggest Trump nominee Bove urged lawyer to defy court order

item.title: At least 31 workers rescued after tunnel collapse in Los Angeles: LAFD
item.description: At least 31 tunnel workers have been rescued from a tunnel collapse in Los Angeles, according to the Los Angeles Fire Department.
